name: Pseudo Classes
content:
# Pseudo Classes

The `pseudo-classes` property is used to add special effects to some selectors. This property can be used mainly to:
* Style an element when a user mouses over it.
* Style visited and unvisited links differently.

examples.description: Using the `:link` pseudo-class on a link `<a>` element to change color.

Pseudo Classes
The pseudo-classes property is used to add special effects to some selectors. This property can be used mainly to:
 Style an element when a user mouses over it.
 Style visited and unvisited links differently.
tips:
* `Pseudo-class` are different from CSS classes but they can be combined.
* `Pseudo-classes` help you cut down on excess classes in your markup.
